REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0397 reute b f BC-UNILEVER-UNIT-ISSUES 03-09 0102

TEXT.TITLE: UNILEVER UNIT ISSUES 40 MLN AUSTRALIAN DLR BOND
TEXT.BODY: Unilever Australia Ltd is issuing 40 mln Australian dlrs of bonds due April 14, 1990 carrying a coupon of 14-3/4 pct and priced at 101-1/2, said County NatWest Capital Markets as lead manager. The bonds are guaranteed by Unilever PLc whose outstanding debt securities are rated AAA. The bonds are non-callable and will be available in denominations of 1,000 and 10,000 dlrs. The securities will be listed on the Luxembourg Stock Exchange. Fees are a one pct selling concession and 1/2 pct combined management and underwriting. REUTER
